body: I heard dinar switching was available, so can a Sr mod switch my donor to Sixvo. Ask mods for evidence of Sixvo being my account. Just switch the diamond please. Switch to Sixvo.
body_tagged: I heard dinar switching was available, so can a Sr mod switch my donor to Sixvo. Ask mods for evidence of Sixvo being my account. Just switch the diamond please. Switch to Sixvo.
title: donor switch

replies.body:
Please email support@avicus.net and provide evidence that you own both accounts
Also if I'm correct GrapeSmoothie already talked with you about that and that rank switching is currently broken.

replies.body: How can rank switching be broken? It's an infinite rank. Just delete it from one account and put a fresh diamond rank on the new account
replies.body_tagged: How can rank switching be broken? It's an infinite rank. Just delete it from one account and put a fresh diamond rank on the new account

replies.body: Dev should add possibility to present your rank to other player. Then you would just present your runk to your new account :)
replies.body_tagged: Dev should add possibility to present your rank to other player. Then you would just present your runk to your new account :)

replies.body: Here's the issue. We can't delete PURCHASED donor ranks from accounts. We can do that with staff ranks but all we can do with donor ranks is assign them. Now again, sorry but it isn't working right now but we will happily do it when devs get around to fixing it. Disregard what the moderator said because that person may not have known of the bug.
replies.body_tagged: Here's the issue. We can't delete PURCHASED donor ranks from accounts. We can do that with staff ranks but all we can do with donor ranks is assign them.
